 ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã‚ö†Ô∏è ‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã ‚ö†Ô∏è‚Äã

 PREFIX NAME OPTIONS-CHOICES

 " Without Prefix "
Works with all Systems

 " A 13-14 "
It's just for Android 13-14
Doesn't work with
OxygenOS 11-12-13-14

 " OOS "
It's just for OxygenOS 11-12-13-14
Doesn't work with Android 13-14

 " OOS 11 "
It's just for OxygenOS 11
Doesn't work with Android 13-14
and OxygenOS 12-13-14

 " OOS 11-12 "
It's just for OxygenOS 11-12
Doesn't work with Android 13-14
and OxygenOS 13-14

 " OOS 12 "
It's just for OxygenOS 12
Doesn't work with Android 13-14
and OxygenOS 11-13-14

 " OOS 13-14 "
It's just for OxygenOS 13-14
Doesn't work with Android 13-14
and OxygenOS 11-12-14
